channel.title: [Class suggestion] New Neutral Classes
channel.description:
I love the Neutral roles. I want more Neutral roles. So I decided to make some.
This is my first time making classes, please be gentle. Feel free to suggest changes to make them more balanced or better in another way.
[details="Royal Vampire"]
[details="Class"] ><big>**[color=grey]The Royal Vampire[/color]**</big> > >**[color=grey]Unique Neutral Special[/color]** > >**Royal Blood (Passive) -** During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice. > >**Immortal (Passive) -** If you would die, you will lose your Royal Blood passive instead. > >**Drink Blood (Day) -** You gain the Royal Blood passive. Not usable if you already have Royal Blood. *(0 uses)* > >**Blood Scent (Night) -** Discover target player's class type if they have Royal Blood. You will know if a player with Royal Blood visited them that night. *(∞ uses)* > >**Drain Blood (Night) -** Target a player, Occupy them. If they have Royal Blood, you will steal their Royal Blood Passive. They will not be notified. If you already have Royal Blood, you will gain a use of Drink Blood instead. If they do not have Royal Blood, you will die. > >Redirect cancels ability >*(∞ uses)* > >*Your objective is to survive until there are no other players with Royal Blood alive.* > >**Info:** The game will not end if the Royal Vampire is still alive. Cannot spawn with the Pretender. [/details]
[details="Lore: Unknown"] **Lore:** > Awaiting scouts to return with further information... [/details]
[/details]
[details="The Plague Doctor"]
[details="Class"] ><big>**[color=lightgreen]The Plague Doctor[/color]**</big> > >**[color=grey]Neutral Killerl[/color]** > >**Medical Expertise (Passive) -** You cannot be **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** and you know who all **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** players are. You are Death Immune unless you are occupied. > >**Persistent (Passive) -** If there are no infected players left alive and you have no uses of Contagious Breath or Infect left, you will gain a use for both. > >**Contagious Breath (Day) -** Whisper a player, they will be **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]**. *(2 uses)* > >**Epidemic (Day) -** Whispers from **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** players will **[color=lightgreen]infect[/color]** the target of the whisper for the rest of the day. Cannot be used if you have already whispered that day, you will not be able to whisper for the rest of the day.*(1 use)* > >**Infect (Night) -** Target a non-infected player, **[color=lightgreen]infect[/color]** them. *(3 uses)* > >**Quarantine (Night) -** Target an **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** player, occupy them and all players visiting them.*(∞ uses)* > >*Your objective is to eliminate both major factions and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* > >**Info:** Players can be healed from infection. Players are only notified when they become **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** after they have been **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** for an entire night. **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** players cannot be Death or Bleed immune and they will die after 2 nights (This is not considered an attack). Every non-infected player who visits or is visited by an **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]** player who has been infected for an entire night will become **[color=lightgreen]infected[/color]**. [/details]
[details="Lore"] **Lore:** > A Physician gone insane from having to disect the bodies of all the grisly murders and brutal deaths in Castle Adiart. After hearing rumors of the black plague from other kingdoms, he finally snapped and decided to cleanse the castle with a plague of his own creation. [/details]
[/details]
[details="The Terror"]
[details="Class"] ><big>**[color=white]The Terror[/color]**</big> > >**[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** > >**Nightmare Fuel (Passive) -** If you do not use your night ability, anyone visiting you will be occupied. > >**Shadow Form (Passive) -** You are immune to occupation and redirection abilities. You are Death Immune. > >**Paralyze (Day) -** Silence a player and prevent their voting for the rest of the day. You will not be Death Immune tonight.*(2 uses)* > >**Vivid Nightmare (Day) -** Target a player, they will not be able to use their night abilities tonight *(2 uses)* > >**Scared To Death (Night) -** Kill a player, they cannot be healed. *(∞ uses)* > >*Your objective is to eliminate both major factions and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details]
[details="Lore"] **Lore:** > A Being born from the fear and anxiety caused by the brutal murders and sinister intentions in Castle Adiart. [/details]
[/details]
[details="The Patrician"]
[details="Class"] ><big>**[color=yellow]The Patrician[/color]**</big> > >**[color=grey]Neutral Special[/color]** > >**Royal Blood (Passive) -** During elections for a new king, votes for you count twice.** > >**Nobility (Passive) -** You start the game with 8 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]**. If you are attacked, you will use 2 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** to occupy the attacker, unless you were protected. If another player visits you, you will gain 1 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]**. > >**Loyalty Bonus (Day) -** Use 2 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** to force a player to vote and prevent them from further voting. Costs 3 gold if used on the King. *(∞ uses)* > >**Silence Is Golden (Day) -** Use 1 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** to silence a player for the rest of the day. Does not prevent voting. *(∞ uses)* > >**Extra Hours (Night) -** Use 2 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** to target two players and use the ability first target used on the second target. Will not work if the first target's ability targets more than 1 player and will not work if the first target is unique. > >**Diplomatic Immunity (Night) -** Use 3 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** to make votes to pardon you count twice the next day. Not usable until N3. > >*Your objective is to survive until the end of the game with a least 1 **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** remaining. You will gain 10 gold for every additional **[Color=yellow]gold[/Color]** you survive with.* [/details]
[details="Lore"] **Lore:** > A noble from another kingdom who only wanted to pay a visit to Castle Adiart, who must now use his riches to escape from it and its grisly murders alive and still be able to afford transport back to his kingdom. [/details]
[/details]

item.title: [Class suggestion] New Neutral Classes
item.dc:creator: Jane
item.description:
Kape:

The Royal Vampire

Doesn’t add anything significant to the game.

Jgoesgaming:

Info: At the start of the game, you will be notified how many other players have Royal Blood.

Hard confirm on royals, no thanks. Hard limit to claimspace and doesn’t mesh well with Pretender.

Good points, I made it so that the game does not end if The Royal Vampire is still alive (like Inq) and removed the notification about how many royals there are.

Kape:

Epidemic (Day) - Whispers from infected players will infect the target of the whisper for the rest of the day. (1 use)

“Prince here, claim to me”
Yeah, I would rather not have the whole court infected because whisper metas exist.

The whispers only infect if the infected player whispers another player.
But I’ve nerfed it in case Prince outs and whispers players for claims instead of asking them publicly.

Kape:

Every non-infected player who visits or is visited by an infected player will become infected .

I’m not gonna run any math on this, but I predict the whole court is gonna be infected by d4/d5.

No direct kill ability, infection is not an attack so it cannot be protected from, infection outs the type of NK easily.

While the idea might be interesting, this class will not work in this game.

I’m not gonna run any math on it either (it’s summer vacation after all) and I wasn’t expecting it to be added, so I can live with that. Nerfed it regardless.

Kape:

Paralyze (Day) - Silence a player and prevent their voting for the rest of the day. (3 uses)

Hello stronger Reaper Chill.

Added the negative side effect of not being Death Immune and removed 1 use.

Kape:

Vivid Nightmare (Day) - Target a player, they will be occupied and killed tonight. Bypasses Death Immunity. (∞ uses)

Not preventable kill which can attack while in jail

Well… yes. (replaced with Vivid Nightmare (Day) - Target a player, they will not be able to use their night abilities tonight (2 uses))

Kape:

Possess (Night) - Target 2 players, empower the first target and redirect them to the second target. (3 uses)

Reused names (this is me being nitpicky). I assume empower as in CW emp? But why…

This class is too strong. It offers too much for literally nothing compared to the other NKs. It also has self confirmation as 2 of the strongest BD, Butler and Drunk.

Replaced both night abilities with Scared To Death (Night) - Kill a player, they cannot be healed. ( ∞ uses)

Basically the older Terror was better and I shouldn’t have changed it.

Kape:

The Patrician

I made a similar class to this. Was also doing something with bribes/ gold.

Was it The Baron? Because that’s like a combination of The Royal Vampire and The Patrician.

Kape:

Silence Is Golden (Day) - Use 2 gold to silence a player for the rest of the day. Does not prevent voting. (∞ uses)

Too expensive compared to the other abilities.

It now costs 1 gold.

Kape:

Hire (Night) - Use 2 gold to target two players and redirect the first target to the second target.

Special class that can deb. Too confirmable.

Nerfed it a lot. Not very confirmable now.

Kape:

Diplomatic Immunity (Night) - Use 3 gold to make votes to pardon you count twice the next day. Not usable until N3.

Also this is a hard confirm on him.

How? It would need at a perfect 2:1 Execution/Pardon rate, and it could be a Fool or an evil trying to waste a day.

Kape:

Your objective is to survive until the end of the game with a least 1 gold remaining.

Aaaaand it doesn’t really add anything to the game. Just another survivor neut.

Is that a bad thing?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] New Neutral Classes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Pro tip: Instead of starting with a mechanical concept, try and start with a problem that can be solved.

For example:

Problem - Investigators are far too trustworthy

Solution - Scorned, a class that can frame and is highly encouraged to fake claim invest

While not all neuts are designed this way (merc and alch don’t solve any specific issues) it tends to result in better classes more often than not.

Read full topic
